doc.field: health care. they want to make sure that we know climate change is real and we're doing something about it. they want to build an america for everyone. they all support hs-1, our democracy reform bill. and that's what we're going to get back to. that's what we need to be focusing on every single day, are those nuts and bolts issue about how we make america work for everybody, not just the few at the top.
